Wikipedia contains 5,903,159 pages.
There are a total of 472,985,819 links between Wikipedia pages.
8,798,298 Wikipedia pages are actually just redirects to other pages.
"List of people from Illinois" is the Wikipedia page with the highest number of outgoing links (8,084).
"List of least concern birds" is the Wikipedia page with the second highest number of outgoing links (7,898).
"List of U.S. state legislators" is the Wikipedia page with the third highest number of outgoing links (7,897).
"List of film director and actor collaborations" is the Wikipedia page with the fourth highest number of outgoing links (6,685).
"List of film director and composer collaborations" is the Wikipedia page with the fifth highest number of outgoing links (6,444).
"Geographic coordinate system" is the most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,095,038 incoming links).
"International Standard Book Number" is the second most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,088,000 incoming links).
"WorldCat" is the third most linked to page on Wikipedia (567,729 incoming links).
"Virtual International Authority File" is the fourth most linked to page on Wikipedia (542,990 incoming links).
"United States" is the fifth most linked to page on Wikipedia (479,988 incoming links).

The last Wikipedia page title in alphabetical order is "ùïä".
333 Wikipedia pages (0.006% of all pages) have no incoming or outgoing links.
There are only 1,251 Wikipedia pages (0.02% of all pages) which link to no other pages.
There are 315,628 Wikipedia pages (5.35% of all pages) which are not linked to from any other page.
